name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocation Based on Parent Process
description: Detects suspicious powershell invocations from interpreters or unusual programs
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.parent.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) AND process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) AND (NOT (process.working_directory:*\\Health\ Service\ State\\*)))`
